text:
As part of my work with the St. Vrain Valley School District Innovation Center, I am on the AI Leadership team. This team worked with Boulder County Parks and Open Space to develop a remote underwater camera solution (pictured above) for monitoring fish populations in the St. Vrain Creek. We trained a neural network to recognize fish and their numbers over time. Presented at 2022 CSTA 2022 Conference in Chicago, Il. Winner of WAICY 2022.
Contact: ICAI@svvsd.org
Team GitHub Organization
